She didn't give you a lot of horse manure about what a great guy her father was. She probably knew what a phony slob he was.

Though, there is still not a proper figure that design the resources from which A.I. are trained. Researcher too often choose quantity over quality in the dataset they’re training, focusing on performance and ignoring possible biases. The focus of a designer should expand towards designing the information we want to communicate to these algorithms and that thinks about what kind of “vision of our world” we want to transmit to these machines.
